verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhura nīlācale vāsa
saṅge bhakta-gaṇa lañā kīrtana-vilāsa

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nīlācale vāsa—residence at Jagannātha Purī; saṅge—along; bhakta-gaṇa lañā—taking His devotees; kīrtana-vilāsa—enjoyment of performance of congregational chanting.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu thus resided at Jagannātha Purī with His personal devotees and enjoyed the congregational chanting of the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā mantra.
